query: mutation createMaterialType($command: CreateMaterialTypeCommandInput!) {  createMaterialType(command: $command) {  ...materialType  __typename  } }  fragment materialType on MaterialType {  reference  name  description  isIsbnRequired  isWeightRequired  isExpiryDateRequired  isPriceRequired  financialDimension {  ...financialDimension  __typename  }  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }  fragment financialDimension on FinancialDimension {  reference  code  description  target  dimensionType  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
